results.title: A Tail of Harry
results.brief_description: This is for Harry, much-loved cat. Harry is getting on and he just about suffers from every complaint possible for a cat including FIV (cat version of AIDS). But that doesn’t stop Harry - he just keeps soldiering on, supplied of course with lots of TLC.

results.title: Face to face
results.brief_description: Coming face to face with my dad after a very long absence made me realise just how much I missed growing up without a father in my life.

results.title: 3 years = Three years
results.brief_description: For Calvin, joining up with Green Corps when he was 20 proved to be a turning point in his life. Motivated and inspired by the people he met in Green Corps, three years on, he is now successfully employed, confident and making the most of every opportunity that comes his way.

results.title: Beacon of light
results.brief_description: Melanie despised the fact that she came from an artistic family but eventually through their support and determination she would learn to love the world of art and indeed become part of this world she once so strongly rejected.

results.title: Spun out
results.brief_description: Serious illness not only can bring a family closer together but it can make them stronger and more willing to accept alternative options when the traditional way is just not working. Life can be tough but the joy is in seeing your loved ones recovering.

results.title: Pot luck
results.creator_credit: Ossie Emery, Betti Wood and Pilgrim Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Fisherman’s World”.
An unplanned fishing trip, looking for likely fishing spots and taking pot luck. Fish caught include flathead, small baitfish and jewfish.

results.title: The Rockhoppers
results.creator_credit: Ossie Emery, Betti Wood and Pilgrim Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Fisherman’s World”.
Ron Calcutt discusses the do’s and dont’s of rock fishing for blackfish along the coast of Australia. He points out the need for special care in this exciting sport due to the unpredictable weather and tidal conditions, which cause many people to lose their lives by drowning.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ossie Emery, Betti Wood and Pilgrim Films

results.title: A Tale of ten
results.brief_description:
An ACMI Digital Storytelling project funded by Green Corps with the support of Job Futures and Greening Australia.
Green Corps is an Australian Government youth development and environmental training program for young people aged between 17 and 20 years.

results.title: Fishing the lake country
results.creator_credit: Ossie Emery, Betti Wood, ABC and Pilgrim Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Fisherman’s World”.
Ron Calcutt shows some attractive fishing spots in Sydney and Mallacoota before going to the Gippsland Lakes. All through the film he gives hints on fishing, as well as discussing the ups and downs of the sport.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ossie Emery, Betti Wood, ABC and Pilgrim Films
